feed.title: Worldwide Newton Conference
feed.subtitle: A sporadically annual gathering of Newton aficionados.

entry.title: Paul Guyot's WWNC Presentation on YouTube
entry.summary: Thanks to Adam Tow and Sir Izaac, Paul Guyot's WWNC presentation entitled Einstein and Relativity: The Transition is now available for viewing on YouTube. For those of you who missed out on the festivities, it's well worth the wait.
entry.content: Thanks to Adam Tow and Sir Izaac, Paul Guyot’s WWNC presentation entitled Einstein and Relativity: The Transition is now available for viewing on YouTube. For those of you who missed out on the festivities, it’s well worth the wait.

entry.title: Presentations Now Available
entry.summary: The majority of the presentations from the 2006 Worldwide Newton Conference program are now available in PDF format from the resources page. Additional information from the conference, as well as the remaining presentations will be posted shortly. Thank you for your patience.
entry.content: The majority of the presentations from the 2006 Worldwide Newton Conference program are now available in PDF format from the resources page. Additional information from the conference, as well as the remaining presentations will be posted shortly. Thank you for your patience.

entry.title: Conference Program
entry.summary: The conference program will include presentations by Walter Smith, James Joaquin, Paul Guyot, Larry Yaeger, Ronnie Simon, Adam Tow, Grant Hutchinson and others. Expert panel discussions, informal 'how-to' sessions, and demonstrations of the latest software developments for the Newton platform are also planned.
entry.content: The conference program will include presentations by Walter Smith, James Joaquin, Paul Guyot, Larry Yaeger, Ronnie Simon, Adam Tow, Grant Hutchinson and others. Expert panel discussions, informal ‘how-to’ sessions, and demonstrations of the latest software developments for the Newton platform are also planned.

entry.title: Conference Registration Now Open
entry.summary: Why wait? Register online right now. See who else is attending.
entry.content: Why wait? Register online right now. See who else is attending.

entry.title: Conference Venue
entry.summary: The conference will take place at the The Warwick Regis Hotel in downtown San Francisco. A discounted room rate is available for conference attendees.
entry.content: The conference will take place at the The Warwick Regis Hotel in downtown San Francisco. A discounted room rate is available for conference attendees.

entry.title: Worldwide Newton Conference 2006
entry.summary: We are pleased to announce that our next conference will be held in San Francisco, California. It is scheduled directly following Macworld Expo, January 13 - 15, 2006...
entry.content: We are pleased to announce that our next conference will be held in San Francisco, California. It is scheduled directly following Macworld Expo, January 13 - 15, 2006. This event is presented in part by the Worldwide Newton Association. We hope to see you there.

entry.title: Worldwide Newton Conference 2004
entry.summary: The inaugural conference was held in Paris, September 4-5, 2004. Dozens of Newton users and aficionados gathered for lectures, sessions, chat and general fun...
entry.content:
The inaugural conference was held in Paris, September 4-5, 2004. Dozens of Newton users and aficionados gathered for lectures, sessions, chat and general fun.

This event was presented by the Worldwide Newton Association.

2004 Conference Program

Presenter listing, abstracts and slides are available here.

2004 Conference Photographs

Commentary and pictures by Adam Tow
